## Render time
```{python}
import datetime
print(datetime.datetime.now().strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"))
```

## Python Version
```{python}
import sys
print(sys.version)
```

## Environment

```{python}
import os
for k,v in os.environ.items():
  print(f"{k}={v}")
```
